scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n server,music,musician,muse "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix TripleAMusic" "npm run dev --prefix TripleAMusician" "npm run dev --prefix TripleAMuse"
scripts.build: npm run build:apps && npm run build:unified
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --prefix server && npm run build --prefix TripleAMusic && npm run build --prefix TripleAMusician && npm run build --prefix TripleAMuse
scripts.build:unified: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/music dist/musician dist/muse && cp -r TripleAMusic/dist/* dist/music/ && cp -r TripleAMusician/dist/* dist/musician/ && cp -r TripleAMuse/dist/* dist/muse/
